Tracing the descendants and ancestors from these points shows no overlap or shared lineage between Charles and Donald or their relatives.

Similarly, no individual is listed as a descendant of both Charles and Donald, and the lineages do not converge at any point to indicate a shared descendant.

Thus, the relationship between Charles and Donald is not specified by any of the given options.
